description:
ossia score, an interactive sequencer for the intermedia arts.


What's Changed
- feature/invalid address highlight by @jcelerier in #1682
- suil: fix build on system with no suil at all by @jcelerier in #1683
- vel to note: fix that notes were killed instantly when no quantification by @jcelerier in #1686
- feature/fulldome by @jcelerier in #1685
- Minimise build on snmalloc. by @mjp41 in #1687
- Open code in external editor by @samamou in #1647
- fix/improve perf fpe by @jcelerier in #1708
- feature/texture inlet properties by @jcelerier in #1705
- hidpi: fix splash screen scaling by @jcelerier in #1691
- gfx: various small fixes, better handle when a shader does not have a material ubo by @jcelerier in #1712
- isf: improve include mechanism by @jcelerier in #1714
- dmx: work on enabling led fixtures by @jcelerier in #1706
- gfx: add a way for render nodes to have a parent renderer, to allow synchronized multi-viewport by @jcelerier in #1717
- sdk: updates for clang19/20 by @jcelerier in #1737
- feature/ump by @jcelerier in #1740
- lv2: better handling of paths, also look in ~/.lv2 by @jcelerier in #1741
- vst: look into $HOME/.vst by @jcelerier in #1742
- cmake: allow to enable c++26 by @jcelerier in #1738
- midi: add a midi to array plugin by @jcelerier in #1743
- window: fix reconnect; improve vsync; add triple buffering / single buffering options by @jcelerier in #1750
- feature/add multicursor and pathgenerator widgets by @D3mh4 in #1748
- window: enable sending mouse events for JS scripts with widgets by @jcelerier in #1758
- feature/various bugfixing asan by @jcelerier in #1759
- feature/various bugfixing asan 2 by @jcelerier in #1760
- alsa: add a backend based on miniaudio for devices that do not support mmap by @jcelerier in #1761
- isf: fix texture origins in vulkan by @jcelerier in #1762
- gfx: work on improving preview performance by caching QRhi / QWindow by @jcelerier in #1763
- feature/faster library load by @jcelerier in #1764
- feature/cpu filter y fix by @jcelerier in #1765
- ui : Improved UX by placing the selectable cursor in front (higher Z-order) in PathGenerator by @D3mh4 in #1767
- window: allow to set title, allow to call window::move by @jcelerier in #1744
New Contributors
- @mjp41 made their first contribution in #1687
- @samamou made their first contribution in #1647
- @D3mh4 made their first contribution in #1748
Full Changelog: v3.4.1...v3.5.0
